title: Media Literacy: Analyzing Digital Sources

vocab.definition: The ability to analyze and evaluate media messages
Information found online or in electronic format
The quality of being trusted and believed
Prejudice for or against something in an unfair way

teachingNotes: Teach students to critically evaluate online sources. Practice identifying bias and checking facts from multiple sources.

sample.question: What is the ability to analyze and evaluate media messages?

truefalse.question: All information found online is equally credible.

multiplechoice.question: What means prejudice in an unfair way?

fillintheblank.question: Verifying the accuracy of information is called ________-checking.

shortanswer.question: How can you determine if a digital source is credible?
